revision.text: {{Category |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |rationale=Contains all comments. |long description=This category contains all comments created by the Collaboration Extension. |PAGENAME=Category:Comment |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=The rating value of a comment. |long description=This is used by the Collaboration Extension and contains the values of the individual ratings. |PAGENAME=Property:Has rating |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Number| ]] [[Allows value::1| ]] [[Allows value::0| ]] [[Allows value::-1| ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=The date of a comment. |long description=This property contains a datetime string of a comment created by the Collaboration Extension. |PAGENAME=Property:Has comment date |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Date| ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Contains a comment text. |long description=This porperty contains the comment text of a comment created by the Collaboration Extension. |PAGENAME=Property:Has comment text |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Text| ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Contains the commenting person. |long description=This property contains the person who has created the comment with the Collaboration Extension. |PAGENAME=Property:Has comment person |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:String| ]]

{{Template |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |rationale=Used as result printer template. |long description=This template is used by Collaboration Extension to format the results of the query created by ShowComments template. |PAGENAME=Template:CommentResult |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] {{#vardefine:resID |{{PAGENAMEE:{{#ifeq: {{#pos:{{{6}}}|:}} | | {{{6}}} | {{#sub:{{{6}}}|{{#expr:{{#pos:{{{6}}}|:}}+1}}|0}} }} }} }} {{#vardefine:myID |{{PAGENAMEE:{{#ifeq: {{#pos:{{{1}}}|:}} | | {{{1}}} | {{#sub:{{{1}}}|{{#expr:{{#pos:{{{1}}}|:}}+1}}|0}} }} }} }}
{{#var:resID}}
{{#var:myID}}
{{#if: {{{2|}}} |{{#vardefine:userimage|{{#ask: [[{{{2}}}]] | ?User_image = | link=none}} }} }} {{#if:{{#var:userimage}} | [[{{#var:userimage}}|frameless|48x48px|nopreview|link={{{2}}}]] | [[File:Defaultuser.gif|frameless|48px|nopreview|link={{{2}}}]] }}
{{#if:{{{5}}} |
{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} < 2 | {{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} > -2 | Article quality rated:
{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} = -1 | [[File:Bad_active.png|16px|nopreview|link=]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} = 0 | [[File:Neutral_active.png|16px|nopreview|link=]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} = 1 | [[File:Good_active.png|16px|nopreview|link=]] }}
| }}| }}
| }}
{{#if:{{{2|}}}|[[{{{2|}}}]], | }}
{{{3}}}
{{{4}}}
{{#if:{{{7|}}}|
{{{7|}}}
|}}

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Used to create a relation between comments and articles. |long description=This is used to create a relation between comments created by the Collaboration Extension and the articles that have been commented. |PAGENAME=Property:Belongs to article |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has type::Type:Page| ]][[Has max cardinality::1| ]][[Has min cardinality::1| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:ShowCommentsIntern |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |rationale=Show all comments incl. form. |long description=This templates queries for all existing comments created by the Collaboration Extension. Afterwards it calls a parser function to get the comment form for creating new comment. |parameters=
{{ShowCommentsIntern}}
|Calls template=Template:CommentResult }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]]
[[File:Comment_icon_crystal.png|text-bottom|nopreview|16px|link=]]
{{#showcommentform:}}
{{#ask: [[Belongs to article::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Comment:+]] | ?Has comment person | ?Has comment date | ?Has comment text | ?Has comment rating | ?Belongs to comment | ?Comment was deleted | format=template | template=CommentResult | sort=Has comment date | order=asc | link=none | limit=100 }}

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Flag for comment deletion. |long description=This property shows if the comment has been deleted with the Collaboration Extension. |PAGENAME=Property:Comment was deleted |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Boolean| ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Used to create a relation between comments and other comments. |long description=This is used to create a relation between comments created by the Collaboration Extension and other existing comments. |PAGENAME=Property:Belongs to comment |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] [[has type::Type:Page| ]][[Has max cardinality::1| ]][[Has min cardinality::1| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Comment;Category:Comment | ]]

{{Template |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |rationale=Creates a comment. |long description=This template is used to create a comment with the Collaboration Extension. |parameters=
{{Comment
|CommentPerson
|CommentContent
|CommentDatetime
|CommentRelatedArticle
|CommentRating
}}
|defines category=Category:Comment |PAGENAME=Template:Comment |own_work=True |copyright_holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] ''Comment for {{#if: {{{CommentRelatedArticle|}}} | [[Belongs to article::{{{CommentRelatedArticle|}}}]] | nothing }}{{#if: {{{CommentRelatedComment|}}} |  and a reply to [[Belongs to comment::{{{CommentRelatedComment|}}}]] | }}''
{{#if: {{{CommentPerson|}}} | {{#vardefine:userimage|{{#ask: [[{{{CommentPerson}}}]] | ?User_image = | link=none}} }} }} {{#if:{{#var:userimage}} | [[{{#var:userimage}}|frameless|48x48px|nopreview|link={{{CommentPerson}}}]] | [[File:Defaultuser.gif|frameless|48px|nopreview|link={{{CommentPerson}}}]] }}
{{#if:{{{CommentRating|}}} | [[Has comment rating::{{{CommentRating|}}}|]]
{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} < 2 | {{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} > -2 | Article quality rated:
{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} = -1 | [[File:Bad_active.png]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} = 0 | [[File:Neutral_active.png]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} = 1 | [[File:Good_active.png]] }}
|}}| }}
|}}
{{#if: {{{CommentPerson|}}} |{{#ifexist:{{{CommentPerson}}} |[[{{{CommentPerson|}}}]], |{{{CommentPerson|}}},  }}[[Has comment person::{{{CommentPerson|}}}| ]]| }}

[[Has comment date::{{{CommentDatetime|}}}]]

{{Template |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Collaboration |rationale=Show all comments incl. form. |long description=This templates queries for all existing comments created by the Collaboration Extension. Afterwards it calls a parser function to get the comment form for creating new comment. |parameters=
{{ShowComments
|show=True}}
|Calls template=Template:ShowCommentsIntern |PAGENAME=Template:ShowComments }} [[part of bundle::Collaboration| ]] {{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{ShowCommentsIntern}}|}}

|<noinclude> <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls.[[Part of bundle::Baseontologybundle| ]] </noinclude>
